burnAll(uint256).details: ETH/stETH claims are limited to DGVA's combined reserve (20% of deposits).      Formula per asset: out = (reserve * sharesBurned) / totalSupply      If burning entire supply, caller receives new 1B shares (refill mechanism).

params.amount: Amount of DGVA shares to burn

returns.coinOut: Amount of BURNIE minted to caller
returns.dgnrsOut: Amount of DGNRS minted to caller
returns.ethOut: Amount of ETH sent to caller
returns.stEthOut: Amount of stETH sent to caller

burnCoin(uint256).details: Formula: coinOut = (DGVB reserve * sharesBurned) / totalSupply      If burning entire supply, caller receives new 1B shares (refill mechanism).

params.amount: Amount of DGVB shares to burn

returns.coinOut: Amount of BURNIE minted to caller

burnDgnrs(uint256).details: Formula: dgnrsOut = (DGVD reserve * sharesBurned) / totalSupply      If burning entire supply, caller receives new 1B shares (refill mechanism).

params.amount: Amount of DGVD shares to burn

returns.dgnrsOut: Amount of DGNRS minted to caller

burnEth(uint256).details: ETH is preferred over stETH (uses ETH first, then stETH for remainder).      Formula: claimValue = (combinedReserve) * sharesBurned / totalSupply      If burning entire supply, caller receives new 1B shares (refill mechanism).

params.amount: Amount of DGVE shares to burn

returns.ethOut: Amount of ETH sent to caller
returns.stEthOut: Amount of stETH sent to caller

constructor.details: Deploys four share tokens and uses the precomputed DGNRS address from ContractAddresses.

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Bonds contract only. BURNIE uses virtual deposit (escrows mint allowance, no transfer).      ETH is received via msg.value, stETH is pulled via transferFrom.      20% of ETH+stETH and virtual deposits accrue to DGVA; ETH/stETH interchangeable for DGVE/DGVA.

params.coinAmount: BURNIE mint allowance to escrow (virtual deposit)

depositDgnrs(uint256).details: Bonds contract only. Virtual deposit - escrows mint allowance, no token transfer.

previewBurnForCoinOut(uint256).details: Uses ceiling division to ensure user burns enough shares

previewBurnForDgnrsOut(uint256).details: Uses ceiling division to ensure user burns enough shares

previewBurnForEthOut(uint256).details: Value = DGVE's share of the combined ETH+stETH pool. Uses ceiling division.

params.targetValue: Target combined ETH+stETH value to receive (DGVE share)

swapWithBonds(bool,uint256).details: Bonds contract only. Used to convert between ETH and stETH as needed.      stEthForEth=true: Bonds sends stETH, receives ETH back      stEthForEth=false: Bonds sends ETH, receives freshly staked stETH back

params.stEthForEth: Direction of swap (true = stETHETH, false = ETHstETH)

burnAll(uint256).notice: Burn DGVA (allShare) tokens to redeem proportional ETH/stETH, BURNIE, and DGNRS

burnCoin(uint256).notice: Burn DGVB (coinShare) tokens to redeem proportional BURNIE

burnDgnrs(uint256).notice: Burn DGVD (dgnrsShare) tokens to redeem proportional DGNRS

burnEth(uint256).notice: Burn DGVE (ethShare) tokens to redeem proportional ETH and stETH

constructor.notice: Deploy the vault with all required addresses.

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH, stETH, and/or BURNIE mint allowance into the vault

depositDgnrs(uint256).notice: Deposit DGNRS mint allowance into the vault

previewAll(uint256).notice: Preview ETH/stETH/BURNIE/DGNRS output for burning a given amount of DGVA shares

previewBurnForCoinOut(uint256).notice: Calculate shares to burn for a target BURNIE output

previewBurnForDgnrsOut(uint256).notice: Calculate shares to burn for a target DGNRS output

previewBurnForEthOut(uint256).notice: Calculate shares to burn for a target ETH-equivalent value

previewCoin(uint256).notice: Preview BURNIE output for burning a given amount of shares

previewDgnrs(uint256).notice: Preview DGNRS output for burning a given amount of shares

previewEth(uint256).notice: Preview ETH/stETH output for burning a given amount of shares

swapWithBonds(bool,uint256).notice: Swap ETH <-> stETH with the ContractAddresses.BONDS contract for liquidity rebalancing
